author: hand
glottocode: < PMP *tangan 'thumb', with semantic change in Malay and few close relatives or languages that have borrowed from Mala

author: road/path
glottocode: probably a Malay loan from jalan

author: thatch/roof
glottocode: Malay item, but widely borrowed as the name of the type of thatch roof used in houseboats

author: bird
glottocode: form is Austroasiatic (cicum 'bird' – also shared with Chamic)
